snippet: For the French master chef Jacques Pépin, the fourth Thursday in November is a gourmand holiday, and the food has to be plentiful and bountiful, with all the marvelous products of the fall.
abstract: French master chef Jacques Pepin article contends Thanksgiving is gourmand holiday with food that is plentiful and bountiful, with all the marvelous products of fall.
lead_paragraph: For the French master chef Jacques Pépin, the fourth Thursday in November is a gourmand holiday, and the food has to be plentiful and bountiful, with all the marvelous products of the fall.
